name: Binary Cafe Stream Prefetch
summary: A BFSTP file is an audio prefetch file used by a Nintendo Wii U or Switch video game. It contains data used to load the first three seconds of audio from a related .BFSTM (Binary Cafe Stream) file. Games use BFSTP files to pre-load the start of a BFSTM audio track, before loading and playing the rest of the track.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
